snippet.title: Poptropica Forgotten Islands 3DS Launch Trailer [North America]
snippet.description:
Poptropica®: Forgotten Islands, the brand-new adventure based on the massively popular virtual world for kids, is coming to Nintendo 3DS™.

Customize your avatar and travel on foot or by blimp across multiple islands. Collect artifacts and other items and discover the mystery of the Forgotten Islands!

Available October 14, 2014

Visit http://www.poptropica3ds.com/ for more information!
